    • parseCommand

      private void parseCommand​(java.lang.String cmd)

    • buy

      private void buy()
      This method is called when a player decides to make a buy move during his turn.

    • produce

      private void produce()
      Method used when the player decides to activate productions with Develop Cards. It checks if he has already done a mandatory action. If no, for each Develop Card, it asks the Player if he wants to activate it, and for each activated Develop Card it asks from where he wants to take the resources from. At the end it prints the action done by the user and asks confirmation. If so, it notifies the listener of the action of the user, otherwise does nothing.

    • market

      private void market()
      Method used when the player decides to take resources from market. It asks the user for a row/col and for an index, then for each resource from the market asks the user where he wants to put it. At the end it prints the action done by the user and asks confirmation. If so, it notifies the listener of the action of the user, otherwise does nothing.

    • swap

      private void swap()
      This method is called when a player decides to make a swapDeposits move during his turn.

    • activate

      private void activate()
      Method used when the player decides to activate a leader. It asks the user the index (0/1) of the leader he wants to activate, then asks for confirmation. If so, it notifies the listener of the action of the user, otherwise does nothing.

    • discard

      private void discard()
      Method used when the player decides to discard a leader. It asks the user the index (0/1) of the leader he wants to discard, then asks for confirmation. If so, it notifies the listener of the action of the user, otherwise does nothing.

    • endTurn

      private void endTurn()
      Method used when the player wants to end his turn. It checks if he has done a mandatory action. If yes, then it asks confirmation and if he confirms, it notifies the listener, otherwise does nothing.

    • quit

      private void quit()
      This method is called when a player decides to quit the game.

    • askConfirm

      private boolean askConfirm()

    • clearScreen

      private void clearScreen()
      Method used to clear the screen.

    • chooseLeaders

      private void chooseLeaders()
      This method is called during the player's turn at the start of the game in order to make him select his leaders.

    • chooseResources

      private void chooseResources​(int quantity)
      This method is called during the player's turn at the start of the game in order to make him select his initial resources.
      Parameters:
      quantity - is the number of initial resources the player can have.

    • printBoard

      private void printBoard()
      Method used to print the new state of the game. It is simply a container method, used to invoke other specialized methods to print all the state in order

    • printActions

      private void printActions()
      Method used to print a message to the user telling him which actions he can do, based on the value of the doneMandatory attribute of the ModelView

    • printLeaders

      private void printLeaders​(java.lang.String name)
      This method prints the player's leader cards.

    • printDeps

      private void printDeps​(java.lang.String name)
      This method prints the player's deposits and strongbox.

    • printDepCell

      private java.lang.String printDepCell​(int[] i, java.lang.String dep, java.lang.String name)
      Utility method used for printing a cell of the player's deposit.
      Parameters:
      i - is the number of resources the player has in each deposit (small, big, medium,sp1,sp2).
      dep - is the player's deposit (small, big, medium,sp1,sp2).
      Returns:
      the resource at a certain cell.

    • printLastLineDep

      private java.lang.String printLastLineDep​(int a, java.lang.String name)
      Utility method used for printing the last line of the deposit.
      Parameters:
      a - is the index representing the special deposit (1 = sp1, 2 = sp2).
      Returns:
      the resource of the special deposit.

    • printDecks

      private void printDecks()
      Method used to print in a formatted way the state of the developDecks, where the user can buy a DevelopCard

    • printMarket

      private void printMarket()
      Method used to print the Market.

    • printTrack

      private void printTrack​(java.lang.String name)
      Method used to print the Faith Track.

    • showPlayer

      private void showPlayer()
      This method is called when a player decides to see another player's situation.

    • printSlots

      private void printSlots​(java.lang.String name)
      Method used to print the Develop Card Slots.
